storyInfo: Cliffheart meets an executor of the Notarial Hall while mountaineering. She offers a helping hand, and, in the process, earns a surprising reward.

attributes.content: Hah! One more!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Jump!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Safe!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That was a hard cliff.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Almost halfway to the top. I'll take a break here.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Is that... smoke? Why would someone start a fire out here in the middle of nowhere, in broad daylight to boot?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Could it be a distress signal?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hard to gather firewood with my leg like this. Hope a hunter passes by and sees it...
Better be a human and not some wild beast...
Who's there?!
Don't worry, I'm just a mountain climber. I saw the smoke and thought it might be a distress signal.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Oh... thank goodness.
Someone actually came.
Is your leg hurt?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Yeah, I took a fall off a steep slope.
What's a Sankta doing on this mountain?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ah, I'm from the Notarial Hall, and I'm executing a will of the deceased.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: The instructions were to seek out a Sankta who left Laterano many years ago. I learned that he's living on one of these mountains.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: I was searching around these parts, and, well... you can guess the rest.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: The Notarial Hall sure works you hard, huh.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You know of the Notarial Hall?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Yeah. I'm with Rhodes Island. Have you heard of it?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Rhodes Island—ah, Federico.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: My sympathies.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Haha. It's okay. We call him Executor, I think he's fun.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: As long as you're not on a mission with him.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Could you help me get down the mountain?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: I'll rest and recover in the town there before proceeding to execute the will.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: You're continuing your mission?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Alright, grab my hand.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: So the Sankta came after all.
Samara, is it? I've been wondering... you Notarial Hall people seem just as busy as our operators, always on the move.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Why do you go so far for someone who left your city?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: The law binds us, even if they've left Laterano.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: The law...? You mean like in Kjeragandr?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Kjeragandr? Ah, you're from Kjerag, aren't you? I should have realized.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Yes, faith in Kjeragandr binds the people of Kjerag together.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hm... there are subtle differences. From what I know, followers of Kjeragandr believe that Kjeragandr protects the people of Kjerag in subtle and mysterious ways.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: For us, our faith is in the law of Laterano itself. We believe that there is a set of rules that binds us together.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: We care for each other, understand each other, and hold ourselves accountable to each other.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: That's how the Notarial Hall came to be, because we believe that all of us have a duty to do what we can for our people.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Kjeragandr's faithful care for each other too, but we're more subtle about it, because we believe that Kjeragandr has a plan for everything.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That's what you believe? Interesting.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: This is my first real exposure to the Kjeragandr faith. I'd love to sit down and have a chat with you, if I had the time.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Unfortunately, I have a mission to complete, but thank you for helping me here, Ensia.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Once I've executed this will, maybe we could catch up—
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Would you mind telling me more about the will? I might be able to help more.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: The mountains around here are steep, and dangerous for novice climbers. My mountaineering experience could be useful.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Of course, if it's classified or something, I won't push it.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Well, there's nothing particularly confidential about it.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Are you sure you want to do this, though?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: It's no trouble. My field assignment is already done, and I've got some time before I have to return to base.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I wouldn't be climbing here otherwise.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: In that case, I don't think I have the luxury of turning you down.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: A renowned gun-knight, Reverend Regis, passed away recently.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: In his will, he asked the Notarial Hall to find his brother, a scholar by the name of Legis, who left Laterano forty years ago after a rift between them.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: A rift?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: It occurred so long ago that it's unlikely anyone other than the two brothers know what happened. All we know is it had something to do with conflicting views on war.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: His Holiness the Pope supported Reverend Regis's position, and Reverend Legis chose to go into exile.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Reverend Regis knew that Reverend Legis would not return to Laterano as long as he was there, so his hope was that Legis might return after his death.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: If Reverend Legis is already...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: He included instructions to bring back a token of Reverend Legis's, so that the brothers may be interred together.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: To reunite a pair of estranged brothers...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'm totally on board!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Any other details to go on?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I asked around and nobody had much contact with Reverend Legis, with the exception of a hunter by the name of Tiana.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: I wasn't able to find her, so I started searching the nearby mountains.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: A hunter?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ah... that explains a lot.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: (Whisper) Maybe you didn't notice because you were injured, but we were followed.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: (Whisper) What?!
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: (Whisper) I thought it was bandits looking for their mark, but now it seems likely it's the hunter you were talking about—
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: (Whisper) Head down.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Tsk.
Wait here.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'll go after her!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Is there a signal here? Oh, thank goodness, I can reach one of the nearby nomadic cities.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Executor Samara reporting in. I need assistance.
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: Oh... Your Eminence?
attributes.name: Notarial Hall Executor

attributes.content: She's a fast climber.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: But I'm not too shabby myself!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Stop right there!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hmph.
You're Tiana, aren't you?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Just a hunter passing by.
Drop the act. You wouldn't have tailed us for so long if you were just passing by.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You know why Samara is here.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You're Sarkaz?!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: So what if I am?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Why would a Sarkaz—
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Whoa—
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You can move, I'll give you that.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Well, you sure can't shoot!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You think so?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: (Wait, she's not aiming for me.)
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: (Could it be—!)
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Too late.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Crap—!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ouch—
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Well, this is a deep pit.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You were luring me into a pit trap from the beginning, weren't you?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Not just that. I also saw how good you were at mountaineering and took your climbing gear.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: The Sarkaz hunter pokes her head out and shows Cliffheart her backpack.
When did you...?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm not going to kill you. I'll go into town and tell them to send help.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I'll leave your backpack there. Once the rescuers arrive, take your stuff, and scram.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Why are you doing this?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: My demands are simple.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Tell the Notarial Hall that Legis is not going back to Laterano.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I really should be more careful.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ugh, this is a spiked cage...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Looks like it was a beast trap, the kind that poachers use.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: But the spikes have been removed. I guess she really didn't want to kill me.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: She probably removed them, in preparation for a day like this.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: And in that case...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That Feline looks like she's tough enough to survive for a while.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I'll get the old man's stuff, then report to the town.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: What a bother.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: What?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: You left enough of the trap's mechanisms for me to climb out.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: My hook's faster than your bow at this range.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Gah.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I just want to see Reverend Legis.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: He doesn't want to see you. Get lost.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Take this, then!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hmph—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Look out! That rock isn't stable!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Wha—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Grab my hook!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Let go! I'm too heavy!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: No!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'm not leaving you behind!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: If I can't pull you up... brace for impact!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Ghh—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Are you okay?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You should have let go.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: You spared my life. One good turn for another.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That's not how it works.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I didn't mean anything by it when I mentioned you were Sarkaz. I was just surprised.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: ...I don't blame you. Anyone would be.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: You might know that he has a brother—
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Regis. Let me guess, he's dead, and now he wants his brother to go back to Laterano, is that it?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: He's not going back.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: You're looking for him now? After so many decades?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: It's Reverend Regis's last wish.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Plus, no matter how big their differences, settling these differences is what family is all about.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: What makes you say that?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: My brother and sister aren't on good terms.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: B-But they're still siblings at the end of the day. All they need is the chance to open their hearts to each other.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You're trying to convince me when you don't even sound sure yourself.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Because if I give up, we'll never sit together again as a family.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: And I know that, deep down, they care about each other.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: There's nothing you can do.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Why's that?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Because...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Legis is dead.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: *cough* Ugh, the dust.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I haven't been here since he died.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: What was he to you?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I didn't know my parents. I was raised by a beggar in town. I guess you could call him my dad.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: The townsfolk were okay, but no one was willing to take in a Sarkaz. I started to hunt for a living, after my dad died.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: On one of those hunting trips, I ran into a big one and almost died. It was a passing Sankta who saved my life.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: He shared some meat with me and told me I couldn't shoot worth a damn.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Ha.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I still remember... he froze for a moment when he saw me up close for the first time.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: It took me a long time to realize it was because he realized I was Sarkaz, and thought about killing me.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: But I was just a wild child who grew up in the middle of nowhere. I didn't know any of that.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I still don't really understand it, even now.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I had never seen a Sankta. I don't know why I should hate the halo heads. Plenty of worse people in town.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: History is complicated.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hey, that's what the old man said. I didn't take you for a scholar.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I'll take that as a compliment.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Well, I asked him to teach me how to shoot a bow.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: But he didn't want me anywhere close. He chased me away with his gun whenever I went near.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: It's funny, now that I think about it. He probably wanted to kill me many, many times, but I didn't get that. I thought it was all fun and games.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Maybe he got tired of chasing me away, but we eventually reached a kind of understanding. I would hide near his house, and he would show a move or two, pretending not to notice me.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: What happened to him?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: A bunch of Sarkaz bandits came three years ago. They tried to recruit me when they saw I was Sarkaz and could handle myself.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: When I refused, they kidnapped me and tried to coerce me into joining.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: The old man came to rescue me alone. I survived. He didn't.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: ...I'm sorry.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: He never considered me his student. I don't think he would've wanted a Sarkaz student.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Without the skills I learned from him, though, I would have been dead long ago.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: He never left this place, and no one ever came to look for him.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Now, his brother wants him to go back to Laterano? No way, not even if it's just his stuff.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: He doesn't belong to Laterano. He belongs to this place.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Give up and leave, if you get it. Or you can die here.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Can I take a look around?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: What are these books?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: The old man liked to read. He tried to teach me, but gave up when he realized I was hopeless at it.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Histories of the Sarkaz and Sankta...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: A lot of notes and annotations...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Hm? There's a piece of paper here.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: A letter?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.text: Dear Regis. It is precisely because we were brothers that we were never able to come to a compromise through our empathy, for it would be insult to one another.
Was leaving the only option, though? Thinking back on it, perhaps there was a better way.
But we should not regret our choices.
Just because we made a choice does not mean the path not taken has lost its meaning.
That was why I chose to leave Laterano.
I do not think I shall ever return.
I will miss your strawberry milkshakes, though.

attributes.content: Look at this, Tiana.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Legis didn't hold a grudge against Regis or Laterano.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: He just made a choice, and chose not to return to Laterano because of it.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: So what?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Either way, he doesn't want to go back to Laterano, does he?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: It's not about going back to Laterano.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: The brothers didn't have any bad blood towards one another. It's that simple.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: People believe there is no conflict between the Sankta because they share emotions through empathy.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The reality is rather different. Sharing emotions may help you understand why the other side thinks a certain way, but it doesn't mean you must accept it.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: On minor matters, the Sankta can certainly reach a compromise through empathy.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: But there are certain things even the Sankta fail to agree upon.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The only consensus they can reach is that they do not agree.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Who are you?!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Velliv, Sanctae Lateranae Eccliesiae Cardinalis, Cardinal of the Holy Lateran Church.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Cardinal?!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Why—
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Reverend Gun-knight Regis was highly respected. I happened to be visiting a nearby city, and when I heard there were difficulties executing his will, I felt it was my obligation to get involved.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I didn't expect someone else to take care of the problem before I could intervene, though.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: No need to be nervous. I overheard your conversation from outside the door. It seems everything's been resolved with a nice little bow, yes?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Who told you—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: The split between the gun-knight Regis and his brother, the scholar Legis, occurred over their attitude towards war.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Velliv raises her gun and points it at the Sarkaz.
Bitch.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I won't let you have your way, Sankta!
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Tiana returns the favor, pointing her crossbow at the Sankta.
Reverend Regis and His Holiness approached war with a moderate attitude, while Reverend Legis believed in one that was more proactive and radical.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: That was the cause of the split between us.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: In his will, Reverend Regis requested the return of Reverend Legis's personal effects, in the event that Reverend Legis became deceased.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Those effects do not include a Sarkaz.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: This is no business for a mountaineer.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I can ask Rhodes Island to take her in!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: If I recall correctly, Rhodes Island has a policy against interfering with a country's internal affairs.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The extent to which that policy is followed is debatable, but I doubt they would want to get involved in this one.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I... I can send her to Kjerag!
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Kjerag?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I hope you understand the effect that deploying the Silverash name here will have, Ensia, my child.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You knew who I was from the very beginning, didn't you?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I won't deny it.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: If you know my family name, then you also know my siblings.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Enya, Saintess of the Vine-Bead Court. Enciodes, CEO of Karlan Trade. It's becoming difficult to find someone who wouldn't know them.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: At the end of the day, though, just my brother and sister. My brother and sister who haven't sat down at the same table for a decade, because of a choice my brother made.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Deep down, I understand.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: It's not that my brother and sister don't understand each other, same as these two brothers.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: It's the opposite: They understand each other's position, and understand that it's not something they can move past. They understand there are certain things that only the other can do.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: That's why they'll never go back to the way they were.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I get it, but I can't give up on the idea.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I just learned that there was a pair of Sankta brothers in the same boat.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: They understood that there could be no understanding. They chose to part ways.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: But they had each other in their hearts, all the way to the very end.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: A touching tale, but what does it have to do with stopping me?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: The understanding between my brother and sister isn't about simple acceptance of the other's actions.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: The most important thing is that they believe there is something about the other's choice that's correct.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: They believe that their choice can affect the other.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Most importantly, when all is said and done, they'll stand at the same goal line.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: A fine speech, Ensia.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Velliv lowers her gun.
Why you—
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I was just planning to scare you away and let you go. After all, I can't very well let a Sarkaz cross my line of sight and do nothing about it.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: But if Ensia has a better plan, I'm happy to go along.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You were sure you would win and planned to spare my life from the beginning?
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: Did you think otherwise? Consider it an act of magnanimity, even if it might be a little hard to accept.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Sankta bitch...
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: As Ensia said, Reverend Regis didn't necessarily think that Reverend Legis was wrong.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: However, right versus wrong has never been the only factor in anything.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I won't take it all, just a little token. A book, or some manuscripts. Is that acceptable?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: ...Suit yourself.
attributes.name: Sarkaz Hunter

attributes.content: I should say, your sincerity was touching, Ensia my child.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: You have strengthened my belief that, even though we follow different faiths and live in different environments, we still have much in common with respect to the problems we face.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I can agree with that.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I thought all Sankta were like Exusiai, but now I know there are all kinds of problems between Sankta too.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Understanding that is the first step to understanding Laterano.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: By the way, if I recall correctly, the Kjeragandr statue three years in the making is nearly complete. You should be traveling to Kjerag for the unveiling ceremony, shouldn't you?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I could give you a ride, if you want.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Actually, I have a different request. A rather brazen one, I should say.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Oh?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I would like to travel with Samara and learn more about Laterano and the Sankta. Is that okay?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Are you not planning to go back?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Not yet.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: This whole thing has given me a lot of food for thought. Maybe there's no real point trying to force them back together.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Maybe they've already sat down together while I've been away.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: If they understand each other, if both of them have Kjerag in their hearts, if they're headed for the same goal, just by different paths...
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Then I should cast my eyes forward, too.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: You came looking for me, didn't you?
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Yes. I had made up my mind to come personally when I heard your name from Samara, and what the two of you talked about.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: While formal relations were established between Kjerag and Laterano at the Summit of Nations, the Kjeragandr and Lateran faiths have lacked a catalyst for dialogue.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: I'll be the catalyst.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Kjerag is certainly in need of cultural dialogue, and there is no doubt that His Holiness will welcome such dialogue with open arms.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: But I must ask you again, one last time.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Do you understand what you're doing, Lady Ensia Silverash?
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: In that case, I welcome you on behalf of Laterano.
attributes.name: Velliv

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: Oh, but I'll need to visit the nearest Rhodes Island branch office first.
attributes.name: Cliffheart

attributes.content: I'll need them to help me find a home for Tiana, and ask the Doctor to deliver a message to my brother.
attributes.name: Cliffheart
